detail_desc: Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and two flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke at the back and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long puff sleeves.
Body in soft jersey with a draped, wrapover front and lined gusset with press-studs.
Body in soft jersey with a draped, wrapover front and lined gusset with press-studs.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and a hook and loop tab at the back. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a zipped lift card pocket on one sleeve. Adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable, padded hood with a soft pile lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and press-studs at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable, padded hood with a soft pile lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and press-studs at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Jersey-lined jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with elasticated ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, and straight legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidery at the top and on one sleeve and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Playsuit in heavily draping jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves and a gathered, elasticated seam and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim decorated with sparkly stones at the front. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Rain jacket and trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Jacket with press-studs down the front, a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. Trousers with elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. Both the jacket and trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover and an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.

Short coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a concealed button at the front. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Chino shorts in an airy cotton weave with an extended waistband with a button and a zip fly. Adjustable tab with a button at the sides, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted body in soft jersey with a wide neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset with concealed fasteners.

Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with inset lace trims and pin-tucks at the front. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, a V-shaped frill trim at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs.
